title: CyrusOne to Be Sold in $15 Billion Deal to KKR and Global Infrastructure Partners
sub_head: Real-estate investment trust CyrusOne designs, builds and operates data centers
body:
CyrusOne Inc. said Monday that it is selling itself to buyout firms KKR & Co. and Global Infrastructure Partners LLC in a deal valued at about $15 billion including debt.
Based in Dallas, CyrusOne is a real-estate investment trust that designs, builds and operates data centers. It owns more than 50 in North America, South America and Europe, serving over 1,000 customers, according to its website.
